General.Name: Jenkem Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Jenkem Technology Co., Ltd. develops and manufactures polyethylene glycol derivative (PEG) products in China. The company offers branched, linear, homobifunctional, heterobifunctional, multi-arm homofunctional, multi-arm heterofunctional, monodisperse / discrete, and biodegradable PEG products. It also provides PEGylation services and testing services for peptides, proteins, enzymes, small molecules, and RNA. The company was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China.
